header: brief-wilan, a quarterhill company, enters into license agreement with amazon
body:
* Consideration paid to wilan and all other terms of license agreement are confidential​

* Its wholly-owned subsidiary Wi-lan inc has entered into a patent license agreement with amazon.com inc

* License resolves litigation pending in Germany Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

header: brief-gigamon extends cloud visibility into aws govcloud for u.s.
body:
* Gigamon extends cloud visibility into AWS GovCloud for the U.S. region

* Gigamon Inc - ‍Gigamon visibility platform for Amazon Web Services is now available in AWS GovCloud U.S. region​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
